meanings.definition: A male servant who performs household chores.
meanings.sent1: The houseboys cleaned the entire house yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The houseboys are responsible for keeping the house tidy.
meanings.sent3: The houseboys accidentally mixed up the laundry and turned everything pink!
meanings.sent4: The houseboys are the unsung heroes of the household, silently keeping everything in order.
meanings.sent5: The houseboys work diligently to ensure the house is always spotless.

meanings.sent1: We hired two houseboys to help with the chores.
meanings.sent2: The houseboys in our neighborhood are known for their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The houseboys decided to start a band in their free time.
meanings.sent4: The houseboys stood out in their matching uniforms, a symbol of unity.
meanings.sent5: The houseboys greeted us with warm smiles as we arrived home.
